overview: In 1852, two friends left the Nevada prospector region to relocate from en route he meets the beautiful Marie who decides to make a trek with two friends, but on the way he is attacked by three Arabs who installs camels, take these Arab adventurers to the Indians.
tagline: Soldier of Fortune... and Lady of Chance...Beyond Reach of the Law...Face to Face With Assassin's Guns!
title: Desert Pursuit
